customer_addr:
5550 S BECKS MILL RD
SALEM, IN 47167

citations.narrative:
An adult female German Shepherd Dog ("Mindy" ID# 48821-2) disappeared from the facility on July 16, 2022. A second
adult female German Shepherd Dog ("Tab" ID#48121-6) disappeared from the facility on July 17, 2022. The licensee
suspects that both dogs were stolen because neither dog was ever located.
Housing facilities for dogs and cats must be designed and constructed so that they are structurally sound and kept in
good repair so that they protect the animals from injury, contain the animals securely, and restrict other animals from
entering.
Correct by ensuring that all dogs are housed in enclosures that are constructed and maintained so that they protect and
contain the animals within. Correct by January 17, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.1(a)  Critical
   
Housing facilities, general. 
An adult female German Shepherd Dog  ("Mindy" ID# 48821-2) disappeared from the facility on July 16, 2022. A second 
adult female German Shepherd Dog  ("Tab" ID#48121-6) disappeared from the facility on July 17, 2022. The licensee 
suspects that both dogs were stolen because neither dog was ever located.  
 
Housing facilities for dogs and cats must be designed and constructed so that they are structurally sound and kept in 
good repair so that they protect the animals from injury, contain the animals securely, and restrict other animals from 
entering. 
 
Correct by ensuring that all dogs are housed in enclosures that are constructed and maintained so that they protect and 
contain the animals within. Correct by January 17, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
